Params: {1: 'Kowloong', 2: 'November 10, 01:56', 4: "Huaxu's firewall collapses (delayed)", 5: '1410m under Kowloong, Tabula Akasha Central Control Room'}
{3: 'By the time you see Pulao, she is already surrounded by corpses and debris. The Hetero-Creatures and Corrupted are slowly pulling back after the initial wave of assaults.'}
{3: 'Lee, stationed high in the control room, shoots a bullet, ripping open massive wounds on the Hetero-Creatures surrounding Pulao. They writhe for a moment before collapsing.'}
{3: 'However, Pulao, seemingly unsatisfied, calls back her Dragon Axe and leaps into a fresh fight.'}
{3: 'Chaofeng holds back Chrome, who is on the verge of raising his gun to stop Pulao, and gazes toward her.'}
{3: 'She swings the Dragon Axe, so large compared to her body size, repeatedly and silently.'}
{3: 'As long as there is one enemy in her sight, she will persist until everything is utterly obliterated—'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'She rescued and took Pulao in on the Nighter. Without her, Pulao might have died on the Nighter long ago.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'She\'s likely the only person Pulao can consider "family" in this world.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Are you talking about the mechanoid called Hanying? Even Lee couldn't really find a way to repair her...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'That small, fragile figure stands alone on the battlefield.'}
{3: "Since Hanying was stabbed by the mechanoid who calls himself Schulz, she's been in a coma, only exhibiting some routine circuit signals."}
{3: 'From that moment on, Pulao has never uttered another word. She has simply been executing her duty in silence.'}
{3: 'Before your eyes, two faint shadows appear near Pulao.'}
{3: 'When you shake your head again, the two shadows disappear.'}
{3: "A person in worker's attire approaches you, clutching a chipped crowbar."}
{3: 'Despite his age, his eyes retain a bright and resolute gleam.'}
{2: 'Master Si', 3: 'Hey, can you see those shadows too?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The old man points toward Pulao in the distance.'}
{2: 'I think I just saw some shadows moving.', 3: '66'}
{2: 'Master Si', 3: "I can't see hers, but I can see mine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Master Si', 3: "I'm not the only one; Ma's granddaughter can see hers too.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Master Si', 3: 'Those are... shadows of the dead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Master Si', 3: 'Sometimes, I also see such shadows appear around me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You mean the two shadows that appeared near Pulao just now...', 3: '74'}
{3: 'The old man offers a wistful smile and releases a deep sigh.'}
{2: 'That Pulao herself can also see those shadows...?', 3: '80'}
{3: "It's only for a moment, but a similar shadow flickers near the old man."}
{3: 'In this realm where virtuality and reality intersect, some things can no longer be explained by common sense.'}
{2: 'Just now, that shadow appeared right beside you.', 3: '94'}
{3: 'After confirming no more fire support is needed, Lee stands concerned by your side.'}
{3: 'Lee gazes at you with a serious look and shakes his head.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Could it be a problem with your Mind Beacon?', 4: '2'}
{2: "Doesn't seem like it...", 3: '109', 4: 'If there was a problem, you all would have sensed it too.', 5: '109'}
{3: "Lee's eyes instantly light up in alertness."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We need to prepare precautions immediately. Lucia, Liv—', 4: '1'}
{2: "This Huaxu doesn't appear as hostile as before.", 3: '127'}
{2: 'It... and they seem to want to show me something.', 3: '128'}
{3: "Lee's brows stay furrowed, while Lucia and Liv appear perplexed."}
{3: 'Although you are unsure of what Huaxu and these "shadows of the dead" intend to show you, a sense of premonition—or perhaps curiosity—compels you within.'}
{3: "Involuntarily, your gaze is drawn to the small room where Qu's body rests."}
{3: 'If these "shadows" are the dead uploaded to Tabula Akasha...'}
{2: "If I sense any danger, I'll let you know immediately.", 3: '140'}
{2: "After all, we've been together this whole time, right?", 3: '141'}
{3: 'So, what does "the dead"—"she"—want to show you?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Master Si', 3: "Maybe it's because you have something to do with all of us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Master Si', 3: "That's why you can see them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Master Si', 3: "But we don't believe in that.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The old man squeezes the crowbar in his hand.'}
{2: 'Master Si', 3: "There's no... so such a place for the dead to return to.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Master Si', 3: '...Should be within the hearts of us, the living.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The words before your eyes slowly fade away, leaving only echoes in your mind.'}
{2: 'These people who exist between life and death...', 3: '170'}
{2: 'Why are they so fixated on me?', 3: '171'}
{3: 'A gentle hand tugs at your sleeve from behind.'}
{3: 'She barely holds herself up, her breath feeble, yet a faint bitter smile lingers on her face.'}
{3: 'Hanying trembles as she grips your hand.'}
{2: 'Liv, is there any way a mechanoid can...', 3: '189'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "No, I shouldn't be your concern now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This contains her memories of her parents... and of Kowloong...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Upload them into Tabula Akasha... Please... you must...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With her final ounce of strength exerted, she slumps beside you, yet still wearing a peaceful smile.'}
{3: "Her hand, scarcely distinguishable from a human's, loosens its hold on you. A small storage device is left in your palm, with a slightly faded tassel attached."}
{3: "Naturally, the medics cannot treat mechanoids. However, ever since Hanying fell unconscious, even the Fuxi Crew of Kowloong haven't been able to restart her."}
{3: 'But upon noticing the two shadows beside Pulao, she regained her senses and fought to pass the storage device to you.'}
{2: 'She asked me to upload this into Tabula Akasha...', 3: '202'}
{3: "Duheng, who has been guarding the room where Qu's body is kept, speaks."}
{3: 'At this moment, she is clutching another storage device in her hand, but the one she holds appears more damaged and... savage.'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "Everything I've done is for Tabula Akasha.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'Only the dead can enter Tabula Akasha, and the dead must enter Tabula Akasha.', 4: '1'}
